bibl.title: Linguistica e papiri. Su un recente volume di Hilla Halla-aho.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Hilla HALLA-AHO, The Non-literary Latin Letters. A Study of Their Syntax and Pragmatics = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 124, 2009 (Helsinki, 2009). - Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 83 (2011), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 93.
